verses.content: Chun, râwl inringtakin ka naa chun a hung khêk a, “Mi tinin mâni suksietna hriemhrei a kuta chawiin, khawpui enkawltuhai chu hung inhnaitir rawh,” a ta.

Chun, ngai ta, hmârtienga um, dâi kawtkhâr chunghnung lema chun mi paruk, mi tinin mâni sukhlumna hriemhrei chu kuta chawiin an hung a; anni laia pakhat chu puon zai inhmiin ân chei a, a kâwngah lekhaziektu lekhatui bûr a pai a. Chun, anni chu an va lût a, dârsen mâichâm bula chun an ngîr tah a.
Chun, Israel Pathien ropuina chu, a umna hmuna inthawk chun in kawtkhâr bula chun a hang feh a; chun, mi puon zai inhmia inchei a, a kâwnga lekhaziektu lekhatuibûr neitu chu a ko tah a.

Chun, LALPA chun a kuoma chun, “Khawpui laia chun, Jerusalem laia chun fe suok la, chu sûnga tirdak- umnahai thawa um tahai po po leia khêk a, thuokdawnghai mi chuonghai bâwkhaia chun inchikna sie rawh,” a tih a.
Chun, mi dang kuoma khawm keia hrieta chun, “Ama hnunga chun khawpui chu va fang la, va sukhlum rawh; i mitin hla naw sienla, lungin- sietna nei bawk naw rawh;

putarhai, tlangvâlhai, nunghâk- hai, naupangtêhai, nuhmeihai chu that fairêt rawh; amiruokchu, mi a chunga inchikna um chu hung hnai naw la; chun, ka hmun inthienga chun ṭan rawh,” tiin. Chun, biekin tuola um mi upahaia chun an ṭan tah a.
Chun, an kuoma chun, “In chu sukpawrche unla, tuollaihai chu mi thathai chun suksip ro; fe ro le,” a ta, chun, an fe suok a, khawpuia chun an that tah a.

Chun, an that zing lai chun keia khâta mâksanin ka um a, ka hmaia hnuoi sikin ka bawkkhup a, ka khêk a, “A, Lalpa PATHIEN! Jerusalem chunga i lunginsenna i bunthlâka hin Israel la um sunhai po po chu i suk- bohmang vawng ding am a nih?” ka tih a.

Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Juda le Israel sûngkaw suolna chu a nasa êm êm a, ram chu thisenin a sip a, khawpui sûng chu rorêlna pawisak nawnain a sip a, ‘LALPA chun ram hi a nghatsan tah a, LALPA chun a hmu nawh,’ an ti sih a.
Chuongchun, keia ta ding khawma, ka mitin hla naw nih a, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning, ami- ruokchu, an suol man chu an lu chungah innghat lem ka tih,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, mi puon zai in- hmia inchei a, a kâwnga lekhatuibûr neitu khan thu chu a hung hrilsâwng a, “Nangin thu i mi pêk ang tak khan ka thaw tah,” tiin.
